entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH, Prévost
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries this evening and ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
